title: Australian bushrangers: Years 7-10. Pt. 3
brief_description: Uses extracts from early Australian feature films which recreate the incidents in the era 1790-1880 to focus on the question “Why do we choose an outlaw who was a robber and murderer as our national hero?” Gives details of the life of the Kelly Gang and their dealings with the law.
